entries.meaning: An offer that has been made before.
examples: The reoffer was only good for a limited time, the same as the original offer had been.

verbs.description: reoffer (third-person singular simple present reoffers, present participle reoffering, simple past and past participle reoffered)

examples: For nostalgia, the maker decided to reoffer the product the way it had been in the 1930s.
